snippet: As a performer, conservatory lecturer and sometime programmer, James Austin Smith has emerged as an ambitious young voice on the stages of the State University of New York at Purchase, and in the surrounding community.
abstract: Profile of oboist James Austin Smith, who graces stages of State University of New York at Purchase at its Performing Arts Center, where he is a conservatory teacher and sometime programmer; he is set to perform with music group Decoda at arts center's recital hall.
lead_paragraph: As a performer, conservatory lecturer and sometime programmer, James Austin Smith has emerged as an ambitious young voice on the stages of the State University of New York at Purchase, and in the surrounding community.

headline.print_headline: An Oboist Who Sees Beyond His Own Reeds
headline.seo: James Austin Smith Becomes a Musical Force at Purchase
headline.main: An Oboist Who Sees Beyond His Own Reeds
